boardgame.name: Puzzle Strike (Third Edition)
Puzzle Strike: Das Deck-Hau-Spiel
boardgame.description: Puzzle Strike is a card game played with cardboard chips instead of cards that simulates a puzzle video game such as Puzzle Fighter or Tetris._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;It's a deckbuilding game, which means you build your deck *as* you play the game. Every game is different because the bank starts with a different set of chips each time. Also, there are 10 characters to choose from in the base set, each with different gameplay. Between all that, there are over 411 MILLION starting conditions in a 4-player game, and even more if you include the expansion._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;A built-in comeback mechanic means that when you're on the edge of losing, you're also able to do even more combos than usual._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;You don't have to worry about shuffling cards because you just put your cardboard tokens in a bag and shake them up to shuffle! Plus, it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s pretty ballin_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo; to play a game with chips. Play it on your yacht, impress potential mates, etc._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Though the game is fun even if you're terrible at it, it's also balanced for high level play by veteran asymmetric game balancer David Sirlin (Street Fighter HD Remix, Puzzle Fighter HD Remix, Kongai, Yomi, and Flash Duel.)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This 3rd Edition of the game has many changes including:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Panic Time to prevent games from going too long_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; A 3-player and 4-player mode with no player elimination and that allows crashing your gems to whoever you want_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; A 2v2 Team Battle Mode_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; A Custom Clockwork mode to draft your own character_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Puzzle chips and character chips updated to ensure healthy competitive play in tournaments_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; New components: game boards and privacy screens_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: #30: Design Lessons _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Sirlin Games. With David Sirlin
Episode 53 - Revisiting Our Top 10 Two-Player Games
Episode 8 - The Best Decks Money Can Build

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

Sealed in wrap, unopened, completely new. I am shipping from the UK - shipping costs will depend on your location.

This listing includes Puzzle Strike Third Edition, the standalone expansion Puzzle Strike Shadows and the go7gaming insert. Everything has been combined into the base Puzzle Strike Third Edition box. The player screens make the box lid sit slightly higher. The duplicate player pieces from Shadows (screens and bags) are included but I store them outside the boxes. I will also include the extra dividers for the insert. I pack my games well for shipping but given the nature of the insert, you may need to reassemble a piece or two. Also, since I have the wooden insert, the original inserts are not included. I will ship via USPS, Fed Ex, or UPS at my discretion. This game weighs a lot, especially because of the insert so shipping is $25.
Shipping not included - heavy box. Pickup possible from 89312 (Legoland Deutschland).

Very good condition. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m selling both Puzzle Strike 3rd Ed and Puzzle Strike Shadows for $40 each or $70 for both. - And I think you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re going to want both. This is a fantastic _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;deck builder_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; but uses chips that are shuffled and drawn from your bag. This makes for faster game play since nobody has to wait for their opponent to shuffle a large deck of cards. Easy to pick up and learn, with different character abilities to chose from and strategize with. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m in Bloomington, MN and available for local pick-up. All my games come from a smoke-free home.
